data.title: Hindi Tv Serial Miley Jab Hum Tum
data.meta_description: Miley Jab Hum Tum is a Hindi Television Serial, Read The Synopsis, Episodes, Cast & Crew with Character names and Original names
data.text:
Neelam Bhagchandani was born in Jaipur on November 10, 1988. after some time, they relocated to Nagpur and Neelam received her school education in Nagpur. After her school, she did her college education from Mumbai.

From the beginning, she was interested in creative work and over the years, she was interested in working behind the camera. She started working as an assistant Director and started here career as Associate Executive Producer. In a short span of time, she realised that her place was not behind the camera and she would have to perform in front of the camera.

She started her acting career with animation film Kandy Floss on Sony TV in which she did the role of Kandy. Kandy was depicted as a socialite beauty and always busy into the gossips of business and other trivia. She put up a good performance and got minor roles in a number of serials like Raja Ki Aayegi Baraat, Devi, Koi Aane Ko hai, Ssssh Koi hai, Ahat and CID etc.

Then she got a role in Ganga Ki Dheej which was produced by Shyamashis Bhattacharya and directed bu Anshuman Kishore Singh. The serial was telecast on Sahara One and dealt with the problems of young girls and unmarried women set in the background of a Bengal village. The male lead in the serial was portrayed by legendary actor Kabir Bedi. Though the role played by Neelam was small but it was challenging and she won great accolades for her performance.

After that she was cast in Na Aana Is Des Laado as an Indian American girl who has come to India to get married. But the behaviour met out by Ammaji, the mother of groom to be who is an orthodox and cannot tolerate her antgonises her and she flies back to America without marrying.

In real life, she is married to Sahil Sachdeva who is an NRI businessman settled in USA.

...

Melissa Pais, born on August 11 1983 in Goa, India, has contributed immensely in the growth of the Hindi TV industry as an actress. She is Mumbai-based actress that completed her schooling from St Louis Convent High School and graduated from Wallia College of Mumbai. She is popular for the roles that she has played in the Hindi TV soaps -‘Maha Sangram’ (2010) and ‘Comedy Circus Ke Superstar (2010).

Melissa Pais has two siblings. One of her sisters Melanie Pais is also trying her luck in the industry. Melisa has worked in a number of award winning and heart touching TV serials. Some of the popular TV programs she worked in included, ‘Karma’ (2004), ‘Parrivaar’ (2007), ‘Miley Jub Hum Tum’ (2008), ‘Comedy Circus (2009), ‘C.I.D’ (2007), ‘Sajan Re Jhooth Mat Bolo’ (2010), ‘Goolmal Ha Bhai Sab Goolmal Hai’ (2012). She has also played negative roles in soaps – ‘Stree... Teri Kahani’, ‘Adhoora Bandhan’, and ‘Main Banungi Miss India’ which was telecasted on DD National channel.

Currently, she is working in an Indian horror comedy television series ‘Pritam Pyare Aur Woh’. The serial is Indian television’s first ghost buster, which is based on the lives of pritam and pyare who save lives of people with the help of maki bhootmare. In the serial, Melissa Pais appears as Bhootrina.

...

Kriti Sharma is an American model, singer, composer, songwriter and a television actress in India who earned fame after joining the third season of the television reality show, MTV Splitsvilla – The Twisted Tale of Love on MTV India. She was the fourth from the five single girls who gets dumped by Mahip Marwah but returned in the finale as a runner-up. Kriti is also lucky to get a work as a model and has done many television commercials.

She acted as Ria in the youth oriented television series, Miley Jab Hum Tum on STAR One in year 2010. Her character appears after a leap in the story, where she falls in love with Mayank Sharma (played by Arjun Bijlani). But after some time, her exit from the show become very controversial as she allegedly keeps bringing her boyfriend on the set and it distracts other actors and staff. Kriti was said to be lacking with punctuality and this upsets the production house. Kriti had an interview in July 2010 to defend herself and blamed the production officials for their oblivious attitude towards her dilemma. But the officials of the production was not happy with her defense line. After submitting her notice, the actress was reportedly failed to attend her shoot and did not send any notice of her absence. The production was also charged of not providing her medical care when she was sick while on set. Later, her character was replaced in the show.

Kriti was born in New Delhi and it is always been her dream to become a successful singer. After she joined MTV Splitsvilla and all her journeys in India, she decided to moved to Los, Angeles, California to pursue her singing career. From there, she made her debut single, Baby What You Mean To Me, where she add instruments like Tabla and Sitar and mix it with a violin, drum, guitar and also a piano to create an extraordinary type of music. Later, she also did the music video of her first single under the production of Blare Video in Los Angeles. She consider herself as an American singer and songwriter with a flavor of her own country. It is her happiness to create music with a combination of electronic, alternative, dance, hip-hop and also with modern pop. Her first single was described as a ‘dance music with elegance’. Kriti stated that her family is her inspiration.

...

Shraddha Musale is a popular Indian television actor and model, who is loved by the audience for her bold looks and awesome acting skills. Musale initially started her career as a model and she walked the ramp for many popular designers. Apart from that, she was also seen in a few small-scale ads. Shraddha made her debut in the Hindi Television Industry with the role of Malishka in the serial ‘Kahani Ghar Ghar Ki’. ‘Kahani Ghar Ghar Ki’ was a family drama revolving along the lives of Om and Parvati Agarwal. Her role in the serial was a small one and was introduced after several leaps. This role a negative yet out of the box one. Her unconventional looks and smart acting skills were highly praised by both critics and the viewers.

Right after that, Musale was roped for her extremely popular role of Dr. Tarika in the Indian Tv series, ‘C.I.D’. This was her longest running role and here too we observed how impeccable her acting prowess was.

Shraddha had also featured in the popular rom-com TV serial, ‘Miley Jab Hum Tum’, where she played the role of CJ, a smart and peppy girl with a carefree attitude towards life. Apart from that, she was popular for the roles of Bhairavi in ‘Shobha Somnath Ki’ and Joanna in ‘Love U Zindagi’. ‘Shobhaa Somnath Ki’ was a historical serial and her role too was based on a mythological character. Again, in ‘Love U Zindagi’ she played the role of a bubbly and peppy girl. Her most recent role was that of Dr. Seema in the popular romantic drama ‘Ek Hazaaron Mein Meri Behna Hai’. This role was a small, but an extremely mature one.

Apart from her roles in popular TV serials, Musale was also seen in the movie ‘All the Best: Fun Begins’ (2009).

Shraddha is married to a businessman, Deepak Tomar and currently, she is working for Sony TV in the show CID.

...

Preeti Keswani is a model and an actress and has worked in many popular serials. The model turned actress has worked in Star One’s famous serial, Miley Jab Hum Tum. The show is completely youth-centric, which was premiered on September 22nd, 2008. The serial ended on November 19th, 2010. The show ran successfully for more than two years on national television. It was a turning point in the life of actors like Rati Pandey, Arjun Bijlani, Mohit Sehgal and Sanaya Irani. The serial had a beautiful theme of falling in love during college days. Preeti Keswani had played the role of Sheena in the Miley jab hum tum, who makes a style statement in the college, giving a tough fight to Dia, with her style and looks. Sheena is a character that makes Dia envious. Preeti Keswani’s character might make one feel she flaunts much of her riches, stature, and class, but deep within the character, she has a loving and caring heart. In the serial it was shown how Sheena had brought about a positive change in everyone’s life. Her character builds up a good rapport with Samrat, the protagonist.

...

Kishwar Merchant is a model turned actress from India. She was born on February 18, 1981 in Mumbai, India. She got her fame in the most popular Hindi series, Hip Hip Hurray where she played as Nonie on Zee TV channel in 1998. She also essayed the role of Vanshita Nanda in the romantic-drama series, Kkavyanjali in 2005. Her performance in the medical drama series, Dhadkan positively made her a face to consider.

She took a break in year 2009 after breaking up with her ex-boyfriend, Hiten Paintal and came back on SAB TV’s Main Kab Saas Banoongi in 2008. She played the character of Bihari Gawti in this comedy series. At the same time, Kishwar is also doing the role of Priya Sehgal in Real TV’s Namank Haraam.

Kishwar was notably remembered for doing the supporting and negative roles. The first negative role she did was from the popular show, Kutumb on Sony TV. She also played a negative role as Mandira in DD National’s Kashmakash Zindagi Ki and as Raima in Ek Haseena Thi on Star Plus. Her performance here received positive responses and it was appreciated by the viewers.

She have done more than 20 television serials including Babul Ki Duwayen Leti Jaa, Kasautii Zindaggi Kay, Piya Ka Ghar, Hatim, Reth, Kayaamat – Jabb Bhi Waqt Aata Hai, Detective Karan, Namak Haraam, Miley Jab Hum Tum, Amrit Manthan, Best Friends Forever?, Hongey Judaa Na Hum, Parvarrish, Arjun, Hatim, Hum Ne Li Hai – Shappath, Madhubala El Ishq Ek Junoon, Akbar Birbal and a lot more. She made episodic appearances in Ssshhhh… Koi Hai on Star Plus and C.I.D. on Sony TV. She also made her special appearances in Khichdi on Star Plus, Sarabhai vs Sarabhai and Instant Khichdi. In 2012, Kishwar along with Amit Pachori made their entries in an episodic of Zee TV’s Fear Files.

She also acted in plays like the “See No Evil, Speak No Evil, Hear No Evil and Do No Evil” for the people who resides in Hyderabad. She travelled in different countries to showcase the play. Joining her are the popular, Barkha Bisht Sengupta, Ashish Roy and Delnaaz Irani. She was also bagged in to the role of Noyonika, mother of Parth Samthaan in MTV serial, Kaisi Yeh Yaariyan.

Recently, she played the role of the courtesan who is deeply in love with Birbal in the historical comedy, Har Mushkil KaHal – Akbar Birbal which was aired in Big Magic channel.

...

Sreejita De is an actress and model, hailing from West Bengal, who is renowned for her work in TV serials. Besides that, she has also acted in Bollywood films. She was born on July 19, 1989, in Haldia, West Bengal. She is a graduate in Mass Media from Ruia College. Though she wanted to be a journalist, on her friend’s advice who was working in Balaji Telefilms, she gave acting a shot and got selected for the role of Gargi Bajaj in Kasauti Zindagi Ki, thus making a debut in the TV serial industry in 2007. In the year 2008 she made her Bollywood debut with the role of Parvati in the movie Tashan. Her portrayal of Mukta Rathore in the TV series Uttaran helped her gain fame and footing in the industry, after which she played the role of Sonia in the movie Love Ka The End. Being a Bengali she has faced problems in speaking Hindi at the starting of her career but she was quick to overcome this lingual challenge and established herself firmly. Currently De can be seen as the lead character in serials like Annu Ki Ho Gayee Waah Bhai Waah where she plays the role of Annu and in the serial Tumhi Ho Bandhu Sakha Tumhi where she plays the role of Shreya.

...

Tanaaz Irani is one of those popular artistes in the Indian Film and Television Industries who not only possess superb acting skills but is also equally talented and efficient in other forms of performing arts like dancing and singing also. Tanaaz Irani was born to Indian Parsi parents in present Mumbai, then Bombay, Maharashtra, India on April 8, 1972 and aspired to be an actress since she was only 6 years old. Initially after completing her education, she was married at a very young age to Farhin Currim, with whom she had a daughter Zionne when she was only 20 years old. Later on, Tanaaz divorced Farhid and decided to pursue her acting career. In her initial career days, she used her ex-husband’s surname and was referred as Tanaaz Currim. Tanaaz started off with acting in theatres some of which became very popular and her acting skills were appreciated and she also got noticed. Till date, Tanaaz continue to produce theaters under her own production banner Tanaaz Productions INC. Tanaaz before appearing in Hindi television serials, was seen some of the important character roles in some hit and popular Hindi movies like- Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai, Hadh Kardi apne, Mere Yaar Ki Shaadi Hai, Humara Dil Aapke Paas Hai, Main Prem Ki diwani Hoon, Rehnaa Hai Tere Dil Mein, 36 china town, etc. Though she debuted with Hadh Kardi Aapne alongside Rani Mukherji and Govinda in the year 2000. Tanaaz appeared in some notable Hindi television reality shows and tele serials like –Bigg Boss (season 3), Celebrity Fame Gurukul, Meri Biwi wonderful, Yeh Meri Life Hai, Kis Desh Mein Hai Meraa Dil, Maa Exchange, Miley Jab Hum Tum, Maniben.com, Aahat, etc. Desh Mein Hai Meraa Dil, Maa Exchange, Miley Jab Hum Tum, Maniben.com, Aahat, etc. Tanaaz got married with her Bigg Boss housemate and fame Gurukul co-star Bakhtiyaar Irani in the year 2007 and is 8 years older than him. The couple was blessed with a son in 2008 and a daughter in 2011. Tanaaz Irani has also launched her own website and is currently seen in reality dance television show on Star plus Nach Baliye Shriman v/s Shrimati. Tanaaz Irani has also been Mrs. India 2000 contest winner.

...

Navina Bole is a television actress and has done a couple of roles in different serials, of which the most popular one is Miley Jab Hum Tum, in which she plays the role of Diya Bhushan. This show was a youth program that had a large number of youngsters as the audience. The show started in September, 2008 and continued till November, 2010, with the completion of some five hundred and twenty seven episodes. It was aired on Star One Channel. The show was about college students and the mischiefs that they are upto; it can be rated as both comedy as well as a romantic drama. Navina plays the role of a rich spoilt brat here, having a condescending attitude for people who come from small towns. She also manages to put the protagonist of the show, Gunjan, in trouble a couple of times because she had the same love interest as hers.

...

Nikhil Chaddha is a well known Indian television actor who has featured in some of the most popular TV serials. He was first seen on television as one of the primary characters in the TV fable named Charnon Mein Swarg whose title meant “Heaven at the feet of Parent”. The show aired on the channel Colors in the year 2009 and went on for a year. It was based on love, respect between parents and children.

Post that, he essayed an important role as the main protagonist’s husband in the serial Geeta Ka Dharmyudh which was telecasted on Zee TV. The show, however, was closed down in 5 months due to low TRPs.

Most recently, he was seen portraying the character of Vihaan Agarwal in the hugely popular Zee TV show Sapne Suhane Ladakpan Ke. He was appreciated by the TV audiences for his portrayal and most of them were unhappy with his exit from the show. He was rumoured to re-join the show; however, all such speculations have been dispelled for now.

Nikhil Chaddha was born in the city of Mumbai and his upbringing was in New Delhi. However, he shifted back to Mumbai after his college studies in order to pursue his passion of acting. There is not much known about his new projects but he is likely to make a comeback soon.

...

Anang Desai was born on May 4, 1953 at Ahmedabad. He is married to ‘Chitra Desai’, who is a lawyer and has two sons. He went to ‘National School of Drama’, Delhi to hone his acting skills and graduated in 1978. He then, for the next 8 years, remained connected to institute’s Theater Company.

He started his acting career with his debut appearance in the Oscar winning Hollywood movie, ‘Gandhi’. The movie was released in 1982, wherein he performed the role of ‘J.B Kriplani’. Since then, he had acted in around 85 Bollywood movies. He has performed almost all types of characters in his 3 decades of Bollywood career.

He has also been working for TV industry since 1987, when he appeared in the political TV series, ‘Raj Se Swaraj’. The next year, he did a few episodes of all time hit Tele series, ‘Bharat Ek Khoj’ as ‘Raja Ram Mohan Roy’ and as ‘Ibrahim Lodi’. This historical drama was aired during 1988, on Doordharshan or DD National, as it is currently known as. In his illustratious career, he had worked with top Indian directors including Shyam Benegal, Subhash Ghai, Mahesh Bhatt and Satish Kaushik among others. He has acted in more than eighty TV-shows so far. The last year, he was seen in a Psychological thriller ‘Main Naa Bhoolungi’ as ‘Mahanto Jagannath’. The serial has been aired from Dec 2013 and recently been concluded during the month of Aug 2014 on Sony TV. Currently he is busy in doing a TV sitcom, titled, ‘Chandrakant Chiplunkar Seedi Bambawala’ where in he is performing the role of ‘Hasubai Mehta’. The show has started on 18th Aug 2014 and is running on SAB TV.

He won two Star Pariwar awards for the role of ‘Tulsidas Parekh’ aka ‘Babuji’ in the TV sitcom, ‘Khichdi’. The serial was broadcasted from 2002 to 2004 on Star Plus. The second season was named as ‘Instant Khichdi’ wherein he again donned the role of ‘Tulsidas Parekh’ but this time the TV series was broadcasted on Star One (a sister channel of Star Plus) from 2005 to 2006. This was followed by the movie with the same name, ‘Khichdi: The Movie’ which was released during Oct 2010 and rated as average. In the movie, he again performed the role of ‘Tulsidas Parekh’ aka ‘Babuji’.

...

Bhakhtiyar Irani is an Indian actor. By origin he is a Parsee Born on 19th November, 1979. He has appeared in many Indian TVreality shows. Irani has also appeared in the famous reality dance competetion “Nach Baliye”. In that show he paired with his wife Tanaaz Irani. He has a son named Zeus. He surprised everyone with his dancing abilities. These were the same couples who were later part of the reality show Big Boss in 2009. Bakhtiyar Participated with his wife Tanaaz in the popular dance show Nach Baliye, at the same time he participated in another dance show, “Zara Nachke Dikha”. There he did quite well as he reached the finals. Bakhtiyar also participated on the show “Zor Ka Jhatka: Total Wipeout”. Most notably Bhakhtiyar Irani has featured in a Bollywood film “KarZ (2008)”, working with famous stars like Himesh Reshammiya and Urmila Matondkar. He has also appeared in the famous tv show “Big Boss 6” in a short cameo guest appearance. Bakhtiyar Irani is the younger brother of popoular television and film actress Delnaaz Irani. Actor Rajiv Paul is his ex brother-in-law. Bakhtiyar’s wife is 7 years older to him and they met each other during a TV serial shoot. Eventually they got involved in an affair and decided to get married. First their families did not support their descition, but later his elder sister and his elder brother Paurus Iran was able to convinced the family and thus, these two lovebirds were bound to the tie of marriage.

...

Rohit Khurana was born on 20th November, 1983 and is a well known face of the television industry. He is popularly known by the name of Vansh, the character he played for the serial Uttaran aired on Colors TV. Recently, he was seen portraying the role of Shaurya Singhania in Color’s TV’s show Sasural Simar Ka.

Additionally, he has featured in a Punjabi movie named Dil Tainu Karda Ae Pyar. He made his debut in the television industry from the much loved youth based show- Miley Jab Hum Tum. He played the psycho lover role of Dhruv. Rohit began his career with modeling in Delhi. Thereafter, he was lucky enough to bag the role of Vansh in Colors TV’s show Uttaran. He won the best the best actor in a supporting role award for this show. He played the role of Bhaskar in the serial Maayke se Bandhi Dor.

In 2011, he began his Bollywood career with the movie Men Will Be Men. He played the role of Sunder in that film. In the year 2012, he featured in Tamil movie named Billa II portraying the character of Satish Kumar. In the year 2013, he got the chance to play the lead protagonist in the serial Dil ki Nazar se Khoobsurat. He played the role of an ugly man Madhav aka RJ Ehsaas. In November, 2013, he was given the negative role of Shaurya Singhania in the show Sasural Simar Ka.

...

Shishir Sharma is one of the popular senior actors of Bollywood and television industry. He has showed up on the television industry in numerous Television serials. Shishir Sharma is a well known businessman as well.

He came into the spotlight through the popular serial 'Swaabhimaan'. It was directed by the well known director Ekta Kapoor. Thereafter, he turned up for various serials like ‘Kumkum’, Yahan Mai Ghar Ghar Kheli and one of the popular show among kids ‘Shaka Laka Boom Boom’. He turned up for the part of Jagmohan Prasad in the serial Yahaan Main Ghar Ghar Kheli. The gifted performer did heaps of theater too before coming into the television industry. He is still connected with a group known as Arpana. Other than TV serials, the actor did appear within a few cameo roles in numerous Bollywood movies. Some of his movies were Om Jai Jagdish, Dhund, Dashavatar, etc. He received appreciation for her roles in the movies Premsutra and Sarkar Raj. Recently, he was seen playing a crucial role in the movie 'Jayantabhai Ki Luv Story'. The movie featured some of the popular actors of Bollywood industry like Neha Sharma and Vivek Oberoi. He assumed the role of the principal in the show ‘Shaka Laka Boom Boom’.

Nowadays, he can be seen playing the role of Mehfooz in the serial Nargis aired on Doordarshan.

...
